wikipedia_page.main: Charles Bradley (15 May 1922 – 23 July 1984), also known as Charlie Bradley, was an English professional footballer who played as an inside forward in the Football League for York City, in non-League football for York Railway Institute and Scarborough, and played wartime football for York.

response: *Charles Bradley (doctor) (1902–1979), American physician who did early work on using stimulants for behavioural disorder
*Charles Bradley (sailor) (1838–?), Irish sailor who fought in the American Civil War
